thread.title: Go sporty with your style like the B and H-towners
thread.title_full: Go sporty with your style like the B and H-towners

title: Go sporty with your style like the B and H-towners
text:
Arpita Kala, Hindustan Times , New Delhi | Updated: Jul 29, 2015 22:20 IST Jacqueline Fernandez, Brec Bassinger and Ayushmann Khurrana sporting the sporty look. 
While varsity letter tees and jackets have been around for long, their recent leather and sequinned ­avatars have ­catapulted them into the high-fashion territory. With celebs rocking letter tees with sequins, hand- printed island designs and more, here is our pick of fashion inspiration to ace your sporty luxe look. Ditch the usual denims or track pants and take a cue from these celeb ­fashionistas to style your varsity tee to perfection. 
Actor Jacqueline Fernandez goes girlie-grunge by pairing her pastel-hued varsity tee with distressed jeans. A cap and heels glam up the outfit. 
Sticking to the sporty vibe, actor Brec Bassinger styles her oversized letter tee with a football-shaped sling bag. Sparkly makeup and wild hair add sporty glam to her look. Beyonce, Richa Chaddha, Rihanna and a model in Tommy Hilfiger collection. Adding edge to his denim on denim outfit, actor Ayushmann Khurrana rocks a paisley-printed varsity tee. A fun, bright watch and sporty kicks pep up his ­casual-cool ensemble. 
Get inspired by fashion house Tommy Hilfiger's fall-winter 2015 collection and add loads of edge to your sporty ensemble by pairing leather separates. 
Actor Richa Chadda is a ­picture of cool in this black varsity tee and skater skirt. The ­floral lace up shoes, ­leather ­jacket and peppy red sunglasses add oodles of oomph to her outfit. 
Bajan beauty queen, singer Rihanna stays true to her Caribbean roots in a printed, colourful letter tee. She aces the look in wavy hair, no-makeup and edgy tattoos. Tags
